connector.description: Query data from an AWS RedShift Database.

camel.kamelet.aws-redshift-source.server.name: camel.kamelet.aws-redshift-source.serverName
camel.kamelet.aws-redshift-source.server.description: The server name for the data source. Example: localhost

camel.kamelet.aws-redshift-source.server.name: camel.kamelet.aws-redshift-source.serverPort
camel.kamelet.aws-redshift-source.server.description: The server port for the data source.

camel.kamelet.aws-redshift-source.userna.name: camel.kamelet.aws-redshift-source.username
camel.kamelet.aws-redshift-source.userna.description: The username to access a secured AWS RedShift Database.

camel.kamelet.aws-redshift-source.passwo.name: camel.kamelet.aws-redshift-source.password
camel.kamelet.aws-redshift-source.passwo.description: The password to access a secured AWS RedShift Database.

camel.kamelet.aws-redshift-source.query.name: camel.kamelet.aws-redshift-source.query
camel.kamelet.aws-redshift-source.query.description: The query to execute against the AWS RedShift Database. Example: INSERT INTO accounts (username,city) VALUES (:#username,:#city)

camel.kamelet.aws-redshift-source.databa.name: camel.kamelet.aws-redshift-source.databaseName
camel.kamelet.aws-redshift-source.databa.description: The name of the AWS RedShift Database.

camel.kamelet.aws-redshift-source.consum.name: camel.kamelet.aws-redshift-source.consumedQuery
camel.kamelet.aws-redshift-source.consum.description: A query to run on a tuple consumed. Example: DELETE FROM accounts where user_id = :#user_id

camel.kamelet.aws-redshift-source.delay.name: camel.kamelet.aws-redshift-source.delay
camel.kamelet.aws-redshift-source.delay.description: The number of milliseconds before the next poll from the AWS RedShift database.
